metadata.name: Broken Heart Blvd #0
metadata.description: You stand on Broken Heart Boulevard, surrounded by peaceful meadows. The purple flowers lining the street sway in the breeze. But as you look down the road, you can't help but notice the cracks and broken pieces that litter the pavement. The sharp edges, a reminder of the euphoria, heartache, and everything that falls between. Yet, despite it all, the lights continue to shine and the flowers continue to bloom. It's here where you realize that love isn't always about sunshines and rainbows, but a journey of thrilling highs and heart-wrenching lows.
